projects.title: Microarchitecture
points: Worked in a team of 3 to design a 7-stage pipeline implementing part of Intel's x86 IA-32 ISA in structural Verilog
Personal role was to design writeback cache, instruction-length decode logic, and part of bus architecture

projects.title: Pintos Operating System
points: Worked with a partner to add support for user programs, virtual memory, and an improved file system with support for subdirectories and file growth to the Pintos Operating System
Learned to manage, update, and debug a large prewritten codebase with over 30,000 lines of code across over 50 files by using GDB and git

projects.title: Real-Time Operating Systems Labs
points: Worked with a partner to write an operating system for the TM4C123GH6PM microcontroller, with round-robin and priority scheduling, a basic shell, a file system using indexed allocation, and network support using TCP/IP
Personal role was to write the scheduling algorithms and majority of file system

projects.title: Chat Program
points: Created chat program in Java, with ability to send text and images to groups with any number of members
Learned JavaFX, socket programming, multithreading, semaphores, and the observer design pattern
